txt.en: Gandalf is at Erkenbrand's camp in the western Westfold.\n\nYou should speak with Gandalf.
Grimbold is at the Fords of Isen in the Westfold.\n\nYou should help Grimbold to rally his spirits and answer the call to arms once more.
You have driven off a number of Dunlending looters for the sake of the fallen Rohirrim at the Fords of Isen.
You urge Grimbold to rouse himself.\n\n'Why? Why should I? Nobody will stand with me. Everyone has retreated, and the enemy cannot be kept out.'
'A little later than I would have liked, but I believe that this turn of events has been fortuitous.\n\n'I do not think I would have been able to gather them all without you, [placeholder].'
'Nothing you say to me can save Rohan, [placeholder]....'
You must attempt to motivate Grimbold to rise again and fight, for the king and for Rohan.
